description:
Learn how EXPLODE YOUR BUSINESS by leveraging the power of your Google plus personal profile! >> NEWLY UPDATED FOR 2016 & THE NEW GOOGLE PLUS!! <<

This complete Google Plus for business marketing plan will show you how to setup your profile right, promote your small business from a personal profile (business page not needed), help you begin taking the most effective actions so you don't waste time on useless activities, and keep you from experiencing information overload when tackling a new social platform.

What You'll learn...

  • - Learn the easiest ways to grow your google plus network and reach 1000 targeted followers fast
  • - Optimize your profile so that the RIGHT people will FIND YOU!
  • - Create optimized posts that attract people who will actually want to BUY from you
  • - Find, Connect, and Engage with your exact target audience
  • - Learn a little known covert method the pros use to get almost everyone you follow to follow you back
  • - Create collections and use them to get discovered
  • - Discover a clever way to use magazines, websites, authors, and businesses to connect with massive amounts of people in your target audience
  • - Master the fastest technique to get new followers so you can continue to grow beyond your first 1000
  • - Learn the secret to using hashtags to GET YOUR CONTENT FOUND
  • - Find out the 4 most powerful types of content you *must share* with your audience to keep them engaged and interested in what you have to offer
  • - Avoid the most disastrous mistakes most new 'plussers' make

testimony - "I just finished this course and I have to say that it is SUCH a great course. It's broken down in simple step-by-step instructions that anyone would be able to easily follow. Samantha just has an excellent talent for clearly explaining every single piece of the Google+ puzzle. I highly recommend this course if you want to know all the in's and out's of Google + !" ~ Mary Emmer

This course is a one-stop-shop for everything you need to know to attract the right google followers to your personal profile for promoting your business, get them to engage with you, and turn them into eager buyers.

Click the 'Take this course' button and get started today!
Follow along step by step as I show you how to setup and optimize your new google plus profile to get your 1st 1000 highly targeted, active, and engaged google followers that will be interested in your business products or services.

Discover how to build a strong foundation for a very successful personal or professional brand on google plus with this complete marketing plan for beginners.

testimony "Expert Guidance on Gaining Followers with Google+. In a nutshell, if you're looking to gain followers on Google+, this course will help you get there effectively." - Michael Lim

Learn best practices for establishing yourself as an expert for your industry on one of the most powerful social networks online.

Establishing yourself as an industry expert on google plus is one of the most effective methods for generating leads, attracting more customers, and receiving tons of referrals.

This course will teach you the basic steps you need to follow so that you don't waste your time on unnecessary activities when setting up your profile, finding people to connect with, and attracting followers who will be interested in buying what you have to offer.

Not only will you understand how to effectively use this platform, you will also learn the 4 most important types of content you must share on your google plus profile if you want to become known as the 'go-to' expert for your industry and have people eager to buy from you

testimony "This course has so much information in it...I'm wondering if Sam is a secret Google+ developer! There is so much to learn in this course that I will definitely have to go back through this it again to learn it. A very comprehensive and well developed study on Google+. Thanks Sam!" - BG Jenkins

Who is this course for?

This Course was designed for you if you have never used or are a beginner to using the new google plus

You want to promote your business as an industry expert from your personal profile so you don't have to manage a business page too.

Multi-level marketers, home business professionals, and small business owners who are looking to build a strong foundation for a very successful personal or professional brand on the new google plus and establish themselves as an expert for their industry or niche will get the most out of this course

If you want to setup your first google plus profile, optimize it for connecting with a more targeted audience, or simply learn the basics of google plus, you can benefit from going through this training.

  • - Do you want to create a good base of 1000 highly targeted followers on google plus?
  • - Do you want to attract prospective customers in the fastest time possible?
  • - Do you want to learn some easy to implement strategies that all very successful 'plussers' know?

Did you answer 'yes' to any of the above statements? If so, you'll benefit from this google plus marketing course...

By the time you have completed this course, (If you take action as you follow along) you will have set up your profile, connected with other leaders & businesses in your industry, be well on your way to obtaining 1000 targeted followers, and you'll know the steps you need to take to continue to grow your audience, connect with them, and begin developing relationships that can turn into many leads and sales for your business.

What this course does not teach.

This course does not teach business page setup, local area targeting, or SEO.
However, if you already have a business page, you can use the lessons in this course to find your target audience, gain followers, learn the basics of how to use the platform, create and engaged audience, and know the best kind of content to attract buyers.

Click the Take This Course button to get started leveraging the new Google+ to grow your business and make more sales today!
title: Google Plus for Business:How to use the NEW Google+ in 2016
